name: The Alana - A Chic Duplex 40 Minutes from NYC
description:
Welcome to The Alana, a newly renovated flat in the bustling Bergen Lafayette section of Jersey City. Filled with natural light, this tastefully furnished space features two floors, 4 bedrooms / 2 baths, a fully equipped kitchen, and in-unit washer and dryer. Travel to Manhattan via PATH trains, reachable by Uber or via the Light Rail two blocks away - total trip time will be 30-40 minutes.

Monthly renters welome.

The space
The Alana is a duplex apartment located on the second floor of a two family charming row house in the heart of Jersey City. Groups and families will be comfortable here with enough beds for seven people and two full bathrooms featuring luxurious walk-in showers. All necessities will be provided - towels, bedding, upscale toiletries, hair dryers, iron / board, first aid kit, and more. Check in is a breeze with secure electronic locks. We are always reachable in case you have any questions or requests. Please note the house is equ
neighborhood_overview:
While the majority of our guests come to see NYC, we urge you to explore Jersey City’s beautiful Bergen Lafayette as well. Within 10 minutes of the apartment you will find an array of hip new restaurants, bars, and cafes located on the evolving Communipaw Avenue. Grind Coffee Shop is a must if you are a coffee fan. Three blocks from the house is the new Berry Lane Park - host to regular soccer matches and tennis games. Don’t forget to visit Downtown Jersey City for local gems like Torico Ice Cream Shop and Taqueria Downtown.

Bergen-Lafayette is an urban neighborhood offering a diverse mix of residents, sights, and activities. This is a decent neighborhood and is generally safe. Please remember you are in Jersey City, not all of its streets are lined with charming brownstones and upscale restaurants. Some blocks, like ours, will give you extra entertainment in the form of the occasional loud boombox or kids playing lively games of hide and seek on the street.

host_location: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States
host_about:
Hi, I'm Miz!

I have lived in the NYC area for 8 years, and have been sharing my space (now spaces!) with guests since 2014. I love hosting!

I grew up in Houston, Texas, went to college in Pennsylvania, and spent time living in Italy, Spain, and Australia before moving to NYC. I currently live in Jersey City.

I am a real estate agent and property manager, and in my spare time I enjoy long walks in the neighborhood, wandering around NYC, all the self-care (massages, facials, yoga), and eating out (plus a good cocktail) with friends. 

I'm an avid traveler and have stayed with friends all over the world. I love to get a local experience when I travel, so I'm happy to provide that for my guests. My partner Mario and I host together, so you may hear or see him as well! 

Any and all questions welcome! I want to make sure you have a great time in Jersey City & NYC.

name: Cozy and quiet. Explore NYC without all the noise!
description:
Private and cozy 1 bedroom apartment just minutes from the greatest city in the world.

Want to visit NYC but don't want to be in the loud hustle and bustle of the big city? Why not stay in Jersey City? A single train stop away from the World Trade Center, you can zoom to any popular tourist destinations in minutes!

Enjoy the peace and quiet of New Jersey while being close to various attractions of NYC!

The space
A wall-mounted TV system is perfect for relaxing after a long day of walking and exploring. Great views of New Jersey right from your bed. Nothing beats having a private space all to yourself to relax after touring around NYC.

Fully stocked kitchen with utensils, appliances, and cooking ware. Wi-Fi throughout the entire apartment. A couch and air mattress are also available for your use.

I also have Amazon Alexa so you can ask her to turn on the lights for you or play some music!
neighborhood_overview:
Jersey City is both quiet and peaceful with amazing views of NYC and the river. Want to tour NYC but don't want the loud noises of the city keeping you up at night? Then this is the perfect space for you!

We are one train stop away from the World Trade Center and is super convenient to get to any popular tourist destination!

description:
Downtown Jersey City isn't the only cool area in Jersey City. McGinley Square is a very trendy area now, we have lots of new development here as well as great dining options.

The home is right at the center of it all. This beautiful one bedroom has a view of the World Trade Center from the kitchen window.

Imagine waking up and having a cup of coffee with your breakfast and being able to city New York. If you need a comfortable place to crash and take a refreshing shower, its right here.

The space
YOU CAN SEE THE FREEDOM TOWER CLEARLY OUT OF THE KITCHEN WINDOW!

Spacious for a couple, perfect for a small family. We keep this home very simple and lightly furnished. We don't want you bumping into everything as you pass. We are like New York but you get more bang for your buck.

We keep this home fully stocked with all the essentials. This actually was my apartment until i moved in with my girlfriend. That is how i can ass
neighborhood_overview:
McGinley Square is a 10 min walk to Journal Square. There you can get 2 trains that get you to NYC in 10 mins flat!

We have some cool dining options. Carvao BBQ is great, Crema is a cool coffee shop with ice cream, ohlala! is a french eatery, and El Cocotero is an amazing Venezuelan dining experience!
host_location: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States
host_about:
I am a young entrepreneur, I manage properties and vehicles by day, I go to school at night. I work hard in everything I do, I think im an extremely helpful individual. I was naturally born to provide hospitality/customer service/sales, at least that's how I feel! 

I am currently pursuing a degree in Hospitality, Management, & Entrepreneurship, graduation 2018. It is my life's pursuit to make the everyone's day a little brighter. I love to travel, meet new people, and just live. My favorite thing to do is, learn about the cultures of others where I visit,  and those who visit me.

My long term goal is to acquire international properties and luxury SUVs to manage & rent them. I actually embarked on hosting a condo in the always beautiful, Dominican Republic. 

I am moving one step at a time, one reservation at a time. I have been on this journey since September 2015 .Each guest that stays with me or rents one of my vehicles helps me get closer to my dreams. 

I sincerely appreciate anyone who decides to reserve one of my homes. 

I hope your stay is a dream come true too!

description:

This private apartment is located on the ground floor of a multi family home and features driveway parking, on-site washer/dryer, WiFi, LED TV w/Netflix, full kitchen, walk-in shower, and access to a beautiful backyard. Hotel quality bedding and toiletries will help you unwind after a day of exploring NYC. Groups of up to 4 welcome.

The space
Newly renovated and tastefully decorated, this private apartment has its own entrance, kitchen, and bathroom. For our tall travelers, please note this is a garden level suite and has slightly shorter 7 foot ceilings; however, over-sized windows fill the space with natural light. The Heights is one of the trendiest sections of Jersey City.
You will be a short walk away from world class restaurants, cafes, bars, museums, and other attractions. Some of our favorite local gems include Square One Cafe, The Hutton, Fox & Crow Bar, and Dulce de Leche Bakery. In addition, both Downtown Jersey City and Hoboken are a 10 minute Uber ride away.

name: The Carriage House Studio
description:
Quaint, extra large private studio set behind a brownstone with private entrance through a communal alley. It features a wood paneled alcove sleeping area with double bed, a workspace, and fully equipped kitchen. The bathroom is slate and most everything is built in (I am a woodworker). Super transportation-friendly, it's a few blocks to the Grove Street PATH train (runs all night) and a 5 minute ride to NYC. Easy access to all NYC offers, or stay local and enjoy downtown Jersey City.

The space
The entrance from the gravel alley is charming and very safe. Please note that this studio is up a short flight of stairs above a small working wood workshop. Hi, I'm Miz!

I have lived in the NYC area for 8 years, and have been sharing my space (now spaces!) with guests since 2014. I love hosting!

I grew up in Houston, Texas, went to college in Pennsylvania, and spent time living in Italy, Spain, and Australia before moving to NYC. I currently live in Jersey City.

I am a real estate agent and property manager, and in my spare time I enjoy long walks in the neighborhood, wandering around NYC, all the self-care (massages, facials, yoga), and eating out (plus a good cocktail) with friends. 

I'm an avid traveler and have stayed with friends all over the world. I love to get a local experience when I travel, so I'm happy to provide that for my guests. My partner Mario and I host together, so you may hear or see him as well! 

Any and all questions welcome! I want to make sure you have a great time in Jersey City & NYC.

name: Bright, Stylish Garden Apartment minutes to NYC
description:
Welcome to our garden apartment in Jersey City. Perfect for tourists trying to see NYC on a budget or for a longer term sublet, our brand new, one bedroom/ one bath is comfortable, stylish and fully stocked. Located in a safe, quiet residential street, it is a perfect place to relax after a day in the city. Only 3 blocks to the Path train to WTC (in 12 minutes) and Midtown (in 22 minutes) which runs 24/7, making all tourist attractions and shopping very convenient. Groceries, restaurants, etc.

The space
We lovingly renovated our two family home and live upstairs.
We have lived in Jersey City for 20 years and love the community and how convenient it is to NYC. Our family loves to travel and we use Airbnb when we do, so we know what makes a great stay and strive to provide it to our guests.
The apartment has heated floors for those cold wintery months and a brand new air conditioning system that keeps you warm in the winter and cool in the summer
neighborhood_overview:
Our street is primarily young families, very quiet and safe, so please no loud parties. It is as close as you can be to the Path into Manhattan (3 blocks) and walking distance to all the amazing restaurants and bars downtown without the noise.
Please ask us about where to go, we are happy to share our insiders' knowledge.
host_location: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States

My husband and I have lived in Jersey City for 20 years.  We love our area because of its convenience to NYC. In fact, my colleagues that live in Brooklyn take longer to get to work than I do!

name: Cozy room Queen bed walk to PATH min NYcity WIFI
description:
Big Bright Private room with new queen bed and Therapeutic mattress. Room has Computer Desk, strong WIFI.
Good public transportation for Jersey city downtown and New York City. Journal Square is 15 min walk. NY city midtown is 35 min by bus

Central AC and Heat in the apartment

The space
Recently renovated house and clean beautiful bathroom.

The room has a brand new queen bed for 2 people with new a Therapeutic mattress
House has everything you need. Its fully furnished for your comfort.

Cook - Full kitchen with all new appliances, dishes and tableware

The private room has a Computer desk and fast WiFi so you can work or study.

Essentials are provided for you including Clean Sheets and Towels

Check in and Check out is very Flexible ( we will work with your schedule)

House is located 12-15min walk from Journal Square Path / Metro Station. It's 10 min ride to New York city via Pa
neighborhood_overview:
Quiet, family neighborhood of Jersey city. House is located next to a main/busy Avenue. Supermarket and lots of family owed restaurants are just few blocks away.
Number of Buses are block away, Light Rail short ride away

name: 10 min drive to NYC Bus in front to Port Authority
description: Prime location! ‘The Heights’ in Jersey City has such greatness to offer! First off, there’s a  bus stop right in front that goes directly to Port Authority in 25 mins! Also, walking distance to Hoboken & Journal Square PATH train that has a few stops to Manhattan in ONLY 15 minutes! Amazing restaurant, Bread and Butter next door! Modcup coffee nearby☕️ beautiful park across street with Manhattan skyline:) Short walk(8 mins)to Central Ave. that has many restaurants, shopping, banks, cafes &more!
neighborhood_overview: 10 minute drive to Manhattan! Bus in front goes directly to Port Authority. Nice park across the street with remarkable view of Manhattan skyline:) Within a couple blocks radius on same street are restaurants, bars, cafes ☕️ and more!

name: Vibrant & bright 3 B/D, deck, Parking 25 mins NYC!
description:
Located conveniently between Newark Airport and NYC this private apartment is perfect for out of town visitors. Walk to the train station in 10 minutes and a 15 minute ride will deliver you to the World Trade Center Oculus. The apartment is a stylishly designed and comfortable place to stay after a long day of exploring NYC or Jersey City!

The space
This is private apartment with dedicated entrance. Apartment is located on the third floor. The entire apt is yours to enjoy.

Guest access
You will have one parking space on the driveway -- closer towards the stairs.

Coin operated washer and dryer is located on the ground floor
neighborhood_overview:
This is a very safe cosmopolitan neighborhood with a lot of development happening. Lots of dining options within walking distance on Central Ave.

We are very close to downtown Jersey City where you can find fancy restaurants and bars. Hoboken is also close by. Uber and the Citibike are affordable options to go to the Path Station and downtown, even to Hoboken. This apartment is close to Manhattan and offers great value for those venturing into the city.
Nearby landmarks
Meatpacking District 1.1 mi
Charging Bull 1.1 mi
Statue of Liberty National Monument 1.4 mi
Century 21 1.4 mi
World Trade Center 1.4 mi

name: 2BR + 2 Bathroom in Jersey City 25 minutes to NYC
description:
Two bedroom Two bathroom apartment in Jersey City Heights very close to NYC attractions (Times Square) as well as Hoboken, Jersey City Downtown Right next to JFK Boulevard and Lincoln street, the center of Jersey City Heights. it is also close to Journal Square (Train to NYC). in 20-25 minutes you will be in Times Square using a shuttle bus right next to the apartment. there is a bus every 3-5 minutes

The space
Easy commute to NYC Times Square and Journal Square.
Safe neighborhood, great for families with kids or large groups of friends

host_location: Israel
host_about:
The Local Stay, founded in 2008 to make the process of renting furnished short- and long-term apartments absolutely transparent, so renters and property owners alike can rest easy.
At The Local Stay, our goal is to take the guess work out of it, carefully curating apartments so that travelers experience the true pulse of the city. And, since each property owner is personally vetted by The Local Stay team, travelers can rest assured that their stays will be safe and secure. Better vetting means that travelers get the most exclusive apartments in the most central locations, while greater involvement by The Local Stay means that property owners can list it and leave it as we handle communication with renters.
Today, The Local Stay offers hundreds of short-term and long-term rental properties in Amsterdam, Barcelona, Buenos Aires, London, New York, New-Jersey, Paris, Rome, Tel Aviv and more.... Our apartments inventory includes both corporate apartments and privately owned flats, making The Local Stay the perfect option for business travelers, corporate relocation clients and those on sabbatical, as well as foreign students and families on holiday. With options for everyone, The Local Stay provides personalized service so that every traveler can stay like a local.

name: Chic 1BR | Kitchen | Washer/D | Amenities | GLS
description:
Soaring 50 stories above the Hudson River, this glamorous tower has everything a traveler would need (and more!) for a trip to the NYC metro. Enjoy all the bells and whistles, including:
-Upscale furnishings, tall ceilings, and gourmet kitchens in every unit
-Resort-style building amenities such as an outdoor pool, theater room, gym, and 24/7 concierge
-Light rail steps from the front door and easy access to PATH
Walkable neighborhood a block from Newport Centre

The space
At Global Luxury Suites, your wellbeing is our top priority, therefore, we are following the CDC guidelines to ensure your safety. All apartments are thoroughly cleaned after each resident has checked out and before another guest checks in. All linens are changed and surfaces are sanitized (handles, windows, appliances, countertops, furniture, etc.). In addition, our teams will be fully sanitizing common areas such as business centers and recreation rooms for guests’ safety.<
neighborhood_overview:
Heading into NYC or exploring the NY metro area? This high-rise is conveniently located down the street from the NY Waterway Ferry, the Hudson-Bergen Light Rail, and the PATH train. Getting into the Big Apple has never been easier!

Major Attractions:
•Restaurants – Amiya (.4 mi), Bertucci’s Brick Oven Restaurant (.3 mi), VB3 (213 ft.), Fire & Oak (220 ft.)
•BJ’s Wholesale Club (.2 mi) for groceries
•Newport Center Mall (.2 mi) for shopping
•Liberty State Park – 2.6 mi

15 Minutes to NYC and Hoboken

Beautiful luxury condominium with 2 Beds and 2 Baths, patio, and lots of extras. You will have private access to the entire unit for your stay.

SmartHome upgrades - have fun while relaxing at home and speaking directly to your TVs.

The space
This luxury condominium was once the highest price per square foot in the history of Jersey City Heights.

Highlights:
- Full 4 Zone Audio System - Even Patio
- Gigabit Ethernet for Super Fast Internet Speeds and Unlimited Streaming
- 3 Big-ScreenTVs 1 50", 2 40", and 4K

neighborhood_overview:
Jersey City Heights is a beautiful, growing artist community right above Hoboken. This luxury condo is located right in the formal Riverview Arts District and has numerous coffee places, cafes, restaurants, juice bars, and dessert places opening regularly.

Right at the corner on Palisade Avenue are regular private buses into Port Authority, New York City. These buses take about 15-20 minutes, come every few minutes, and are about $3 per person.

Also right at the corner is NJ Transit Buses Route 123 which goes to Port Authority for $4.50, but you must have exact change.

NJ Transit App can be downloaded for routes and fares as well as CityMapper app.

A few blocks to Franklin Street and there will be new stairs to the 2nd Street Light Rail Station in Hoboken, you can take the rail to the path or ferry and get to Downtown or Midtown Manhattan. This makes for a possibly nicer trip, plus the benefits of access to the entire Gold Coast of New

name: Newly renovated apartment - 10 minutes to NYC
description:
Modern and minimalist apartment, completely renovated in 2019. Sleeps 4: two twin beds in the common area, queen bed in the separate bedroom. Plenty of closet space. European-style bathroom. Kitchenette (with goodies for breakfast and late-night snacks), dining set for 4, workspace (high speed internet), and smart TV in the common area. 10 minute walk to the Path (subway) station; 2 stops to Manhattan.

The space
The motto of the apartment is: Everything guests need, and nothing they don't. Based on the owners extensive travel experiences, guests need a clean, comfortable place that combines convenience with practicality. What they don't need is having their surroundings cluttered with the owner's personal belongings and/or items that they are unlikely to use during their stay. Hence, the apartment strives to prove that 'simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.'
neighborhood_overview: Located in Historic Downtown Jersey City, a 5-minute walk gets you to lots of restaurants and bars, deli, mini market, supermarket with huge organic selection, liquor store, laundromat,  Hamilton park (children's playgrounds, tennis and basketball courts), Newport Mall. You will find a more detailed description (exact location, opening hours) in the apartment.
host_location: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States
host_about:
Visiting NYC? Stay at Sonja's AirBnB!
I fell in love with New York City even before I visited it for the first time as a teenager. Having lived in its close proximity for a quarter century, I can attest that "there is nothing you can't do," and that its "streets will make you feel brand new." I am grateful and excited to play a part in your New York experience by welcoming you to my apartment in Jersey City's Historic Downtown, just a 10-minute walk and 2-stop subway ride away from "the city that never sleeps."

neighborhood_overview: Journal Square is an eclectic and diverse neighborhood with quick access to Manhattan.  Visitors can see signs of its past as a pre-war entertainment district, and even a few landmarks dating back to its start as a Dutch colonial settlement at Bergen Square.  Jersey City is a well-integrated part of the bustling NYC metro area, but retains a proud identity of its own, showcasing incredible food and a thriving urban art scene.

neighborhood_overview:
Located just across the Hudson River from New York City, some refer to Jersey City as the sixth borough. Overlooking Hoboken and the Manhattan skyline, Jersey City Heights is a go-to spot for tourists.
Due to its location, one hundred feet above sea level on the western side of the Hudson River, residents get to enjoy beautiful scenic views of the Manhattan skyline from one side and beautiful marshes and meadowlands on the other side. Variety of public transportation options like the PATH Train, New Jersey Transit’s  Light Rail, and public buses make your traveling to New York City, downtown Jersey City, or Hoboken quick and convenient. Take the stairs off Paterson Plank Road to Hoboken’s 2nd Street Light Rail Station or the elevator at Congress Street to the 9th Street Light Rail Station to easily commute around Hoboken, Weehawken, Jersey City, Bayonne and beyond! New Jersey Transit bus routes also serve this neighborhood, with several major lines to help you zip around locally

neighborhood_overview:
Located just across the Hudson River from New York City, some refer to Jersey City as the sixth borough. Jersey City's Heights section exemplifies convenient, commuter friendly living in a timeless charming neighborhood! Overlooking Hoboken and the Manhattan skyline, Jersey City Heights is a go-to spot for tourists.
Due to its location, one hundred feet above sea level on the western side of the Hudson River, residents get to enjoy beautiful scenic views of the Manhattan skyline from one side and beautiful marshes and meadowlands on the other side. Variety of public transportation options like the PATH Train, New Jersey Transit’s Light Rail, and public buses make your traveling to New York City, downtown Jersey City, or Hoboken quick and convenient. Take the stairs off Paterson Plank Road to Hoboken’s 2nd Street Light Rail Station or the elevator at Congress Street to the 9th Street Light Rail Station to easily commute around Hoboken, Weehawken, Jersey City, Bayonne and beyond! This apartment is professionally managed by Furnished Quarters, the largest independently owned and operated supplier of short-term furnished housing with over 20 years of experience in the industry. The upscale, pet-friendly building’s amenities include a 24-hour attended lobby, fitness center with yoga studio, children's playroom, pool with sundeck, billiards room, lounge and more. The surrounding area of downtown Jersey City is vibrant and historic, with plenty of restaurants, museums, shopping and parks waiting to be explored. The PATH train, located mere steps from the apartment building, provides a 10-20 minute ride into Manhattan.

The space
This vibrant two bedroom is located in a luxury building in the lively Grove Street neighborhood of Jersey City. The apartment features stainless steel kitchen appliances, white matte finish kitchen cabinets, cashmere white countertops, gray subway tile backsplash, LED lighting throughout, hardwood floors, roller-shade
neighborhood_overview: Jersey City is the second most populous city in the state of New Jersey. Located just across the Hudson River from Lower Manhattan, it’s part of the New York metropolitan area. The city’s architecture ranges from Industrial Age homes to classic brownstones to modern high rises. Downtown Jersey City, a major historical district, overlooks the Manhattan skyline. The waterfront section of the city is nicknamed “Wall Street West” for being home to several employers in the financial services, securities and insurance industries. The lofty office buildings, including the highly distinctive Goldman Sachs Tower, create a stunning skyline. With its proximity to Manhattan, Jersey City is popular among young professionals working in New York City looking for an alternative to living in one of the five boroughs. It is also one of the most ethnically diverse cities in the world, with large populations of Hispanic, Asian and Indian Americans. The Port Authority Trans-Hudson (PATH) train, a 24-hour s

name: Private Urban Oasis w/ Backyard / 15 min to NYC
description:
Welcome to my home!

Just 15 steps away from the one bedroom apartment and you get the bus that takes around 15 minutes to Time Square!!! Newark Int'l Airport is around a 20 minute drive away. A 5 minute walk away is the Lightrail to get around Jersey City. There is street parking but you should get a daily permit and be mindful of street signs.

The apartment has a keyless entry so I am flexible and can make accommodations re. check in, check out, leaving bags, etc. Just ask :)

The space
The private one bedroom apartment (approximately 600 square feet total and located on the semi-basement floor) gives you the warm feeling of a home away from home while on vacation. The backyard is great to relax or have a bbq. The apartment is completely private and you have exclusive use of the entire bottom floor and a private part of the backyard. As for added bonuses, I provide a Keurig machine and blackout curtains throughout the apartment. I provide
neighborhood_overview: My area of Jersey City is very vibrant, eclectic and diverse, with nice cafes and restaurants and it is safe. In the apartment is a brochure which provides information for local spots. Some of my favorite local spots are within a couple of blocks of the apartment. Corto restaurant is a favorite and has a farm to table menu, outdoor seating in the backyard and it is BYOB. Fox and Crow is a nice burger spot that has a parlor in the backroom where you can enjoy live music on Friday and Saturday nights. Milk Sugar Love is an organic ice cream shop. Also, Riverview Park, just one block away, provides great views of Manhattan, especially at night.

name: TwinCity 2 BR/1 BA Apt - Minutes To NYC!
description:
Create a memorable vacation or business trip by staying at this clean and relaxing 2 bedroom apartment. Located one stop from downtown Manhattan and walking distance from great restaurants and bars, you can enjoy the best that NYC and Jersey City have to offer.

The space
The space
2 bedroom / 1 bathroom apartment with all the essentials including:

-Fresh linens and towels
-Kitchen with all the basics
-Wifi
-Heating and air conditioning
-Coffee and tea selection
-TV with Netflix for streaming shows and movies
-Shampoo, body wash, and hand soap
-Hairdryer, iron, and more

Living room (sleeps 2)- sofa bed, coffee table, TV with Netflix

Kitchen area- table with 4 chairs, refrigerator, stove, oven, microwave, coffee maker, kettle, plates, mugs, bowls, utensils, pots and pans, cutting board

Bedroom #1 (sleeps 2)- Queen size bed, night stand, blackout shades
neighborhood_overview: Located steps from Newark Avenue, the Center of Downtown Jersey City, where you will find some of the best restaurants, bars, and coffee shops the Jersey City has to offer.  You are also just a 5 minute walk to the Grove St PATH Train which connects Downtown Jersey City to both Downtown and Midtown New York City in a matter of minutes. So if you’re looking to stay in Jersey City or adventure into New York, look no further than this apartment for everything you will need to have a great trip!

name: Pretty cozy studio 10 mn from Manhattan
description:
Nice studio 10 minutes from Manhattan. Completely refurbished, fully equipped. Very quiet location. Less than 5 minutes walk from the train station and 10 minutes by train from the World Trade Center. 20 mins by taxi from Newark Airport. Restaurants, supermarkets, pharmacy and a big choice of shops nearby. Ideal for shopping. Breathtaking view along the Hudson River. Can accommodate a couple in very comfortable king and memory form bed.

The space
Elevator, very quiet. Excellent location.
neighborhood_overview: A small public market where you can buy local vegetables and fruits takes place twice a week nearby the train station.  Banks, supermarkets, pharmacy, post office, clothing stores, shoes, sports equipment are located 5 minutes walk, all at very affordable prices.

description:
This furnished one-bedroom apartment at 198 Morgan Street is perfect for your extended business stay on the East Coast. You'll love this central location in Jersey City, right by the waterfront and historic downtown area. Bars, restaurants, and the NJ Path Station can all be found just a 1/2 block away, and you are a short train ride from the World Trade Center. Light rail, PATH, ferries, and the Holland Tunnel quickly get you across the Hudson to Manhattan and beyond.

Enjoy a stay with Zeus! We have 5025+ reviews (see below).

host_location: San Francisco, California, United States
host_about:
We built Zeus Living so you can feel at home wherever opportunity takes you. Whether it’s for a month, a year, or sometime in between, you can count on a thoughtfully designed home and a comfortable, easy stay. Our technology helps us select homes you’ll love in ideal locations at a good value, while our expert team handles all the details. Based in San Francisco, and operating in the Bay Area, Los Angeles, New York City, Seattle, Boston, and Washington, D.C.


** 
PLEASE NOTE: Many of our homes are pet friendly, which you will see listed under "House Rules". If you do plan to bring your furry friend(s), we have a one-time non-refundable $500 pet fee and have a limit of 2 pets max. We have several dog breed restrictions. Most of our dog-friendly homes do not allow American Pit bulls, Rottweilers, Akitas, Cane Corsos, Presa Canarios, Bull Mastiffs, Staffordshire Terriers, Dobermans, German Shepherds, Boxers, Malamutes, Huskies, Dalmatians, Chow Chows, Fila Brasileiros, or Wolf hybrids. We encourage individuals with service animals or one of the breeds listed as restricted to contact us before booking.

description:
Clean, quiet and safe space in the fantastic neighborhood of Jersey City Heights. This room is a great, affordable option for one or two people! Enjoy scenic views of Manhattan on the quick 25-minute bus ride to Times Square. The bus stop is less than a block of a walk!!

Also cheap Uber ride to Hoboken and Journal Square, with direct PATH train to the city. The brand new apartment is stylishly decorated for your enjoyment. Bathrooms are very clean, and WIFI is available throughout.

The space
The apartment was built less than 2 years ago, so everything is brand new and fully functional. Kitchen is fully stocked with cookware, bakeware, utensils, tea kettle, and coffee machine. Digital door locks allow each person in your group to come and go as they please without coordinating key exchange. High-Speed WiFi is available.

host_about:
The Local Stay, founded in 2008 to make the process of renting furnished short- and long-term apartments absolutely transparent, so renters and property owners alike can rest easy.
At The Local Stay, our goal is to take the guess work out of it, carefully curating apartments so that travelers experience the true pulse of the city. And, since each property owner is personally vetted by The Local Stay team, travelers can rest assured that their stays will be safe and secure. Better vetting means that travelers get the most exclusive apartments in the most central locations, while greater involvement by The Local Stay means that property owners can list it and leave it as we handle communication with renters.
Today, The Local Stay offers hundreds of short-term and long-term rental properties in Amsterdam, Barcelona, Buenos Aires, London, New York, New-Jersey, Paris, Rome, Tel Aviv and more.... Our apartments inventory includes both corporate apartments and privately owned flats, making The Local Stay the perfect option for business travelers, corporate relocation clients and those on sabbatical, as well as foreign students and families on holiday. With options for everyone, The Local Stay provides personalized service so that every traveler can stay like a local.

The apartment is just behind the Newport Centre Mall, a large traditional indoor shopping complex anchored by Macy's, JCPenney, Sears, Kohl's, H&M, and ZARA.

Outside the mall and around the Newport area are a variety of primarily neighborhood oriented restaurants and retail stores (known collectively as "The Newport River Market") including a number of notables such as a Target Staples and Best Buy

host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
We have been providing vacation rental apartments for over 10 years across the East Coast. We are known for our distinctively furnished apartments in popular locations, and for our attentive service. You’ll find that our rates are quite reasonable. If you're looking for a safe, comfortable place with fabulous amenities and Wi-Fi (we know you need the Wi-Fi!) in the Boston MA area, Washington DC, Miami FL or very close to NYC in Jersey City or Hoboken, we'd love to host you. Many of the buildings where our apartments are located feature amenities such as beautiful lobbies, 24 hour front desk staff, fitness centers, business centers, recreation rooms, indoor or outdoor pools and whirlpools. If you are traveling with children, some buildings offer playgrounds (many buildings are near public playgrounds as well) or indoor playrooms. Depending on the location, you can stay for just a few days, a week, a month or more. 

We offer an assortment of short-term apartments in sizes ranging from a studio to three bedrooms that are fully furnished with all the comforts of home. Our local staff meticulously prepares your apartment before your arrival, and we offer 24 hour assistance for any emergencies after business hours. When you arrive at your apartment, the beds will be made, towels and bath amenities will be stocked in the bathrooms, and the coffee maker will be set up in the kitchen with some sample coffees, sweetener and creamer (teabags too if that is your preference) to start your morning off properly. If you’d like to cook a meal, the kitchen is stocked with dishes, cutlery, glassware and pots and pans. The living room is set up with a TV and cable channels, and the Wi-Fi router password and instructions will be prominently displayed so you can get connected quickly. You can also make local and toll-free phone calls at no charge.

name: State-of-the-art 2 bed apartment to Jersey City
description:
Standing 50 stories high and overlooking Manhattan's skyline, this luxury building is a one of a kind; offering the latest in amenities and services like an outdoor heated pool and spa, a fitness center, a theatre room, a playroom, and a sophisticated clubroom, you will find well-appointed apartments with nine foot ceilings, fully-equipped designer kitchens, and hardwood floors. As if it wasn't enough, all transport connections to NYC are only a few feet away.

The space
Experience luxury like you never have before in these fantastic Hudson riverfront apartments. Do you fancy a heated outdoor pool and spa with Manhattan views? A modern fitness center, a state-of-the-art theatre room, a clubroom with billiards, and a playroom and playground for the kids? You got it in this tower located a few steps away from the Newport Path station and the best restaurants in the area offering fantastic skyline views. These apartments feature the best upscale finishes like 9 foot
neighborhood_overview: The property is conveniently located about 25 minutes from Newark Liberty International Airport. Public transportation is also easily accessible – shuttle service to PATH/Ferry & just a short walk to the NY Waterway Ferry, Hudson-Bergen light rail, and the PATH.
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
We have been providing vacation rental apartments for over 10 years across the East Coast. We are known for our distinctively furnished apartments in popular locations, and for our attentive service. You’ll find that our rates are quite reasonable. If you're looking for a safe, comfortable place with fabulous amenities and Wi-Fi (we know you need the Wi-Fi!) in the Boston MA area, Washington DC, Miami FL or very close to NYC in Jersey City or Hoboken, we'd love to host you. Many of the buildings where our apartments are located feature amenities such as beautiful lobbies, 24 hour front desk staff, fitness centers, business centers, recreation rooms, indoor or outdoor pools and whirlpools. If you are traveling with children, some buildings offer playgrounds (many buildings are near public playgrounds as well) or indoor playrooms. Depending on the location, you can stay for just a few days, a week, a month or more. 

We offer an assortment of short-term apartments in sizes ranging from a studio to three bedrooms that are fully furnished with all the comforts of home. Our local staff meticulously prepares your apartment before your arrival, and we offer 24 hour assistance for any emergencies after business hours. When you arrive at your apartment, the beds will be made, towels and bath amenities will be stocked in the bathrooms, and the coffee maker will be set up in the kitchen with some sample coffees, sweetener and creamer (teabags too if that is your preference) to start your morning off properly. If you’d like to cook a meal, the kitchen is stocked with dishes, cutlery, glassware and pots and pans. The living room is set up with a TV and cable channels, and the Wi-Fi router password and instructions will be prominently displayed so you can get connected quickly. You can also make local and toll-free phone calls at no charge. 

Please contact us to confirm the exact availability of the apartment you are interested in. We’d love to host you (and your family) for your vacation or business trip.

name: Comfortable home in Jersey City
description:
The house is two short blocks from the Light Rail (Richard Street Stop) which goes to Hoboken Terminal then a short walk to the PATH (Port Authority Trans Hudson) train into the City. About a 30 minute trip if lucky with the timing! The house has a nice view and a comfortable back yard. As an alternate you can walk 15/20 minutes to the Port Liberte ferry to Bowling Green. I have a Steinway grand (in tune!) and often cook dinner which you'd be welcome to join if you want.

The space
The place is comfortable and clean. I have Netflix and Amazon.

name: Zen-Styled Jersey City Apartment - 15 min to NYC
description:
Enjoy our Jersey City 1 bedroom apartment. Our home is fully furnished with a modern zen feel. We are located in the Journal Square neighborhood and across the street from the beautiful Lincoln Park. We are on a quiet street, and blocks away from the Journal Square PATH train station which takes you right into the city in 10 minutes. WiFi is included!

The space
If you are looking to enjoy NYC, the Journal Square PATH train is located a mile away. from here you can be in Manhattan in 10 minutes. Take a nice walk to the train station, ride the bus from the corner, or Uber there in 5 minutes.

Jersey City also has a lot to offer. The Grove Street neighborhood is full of bars and amazing restaurants, and also just a 5 minute Uber down the street.

We are across the street from Lincoln Park, which is full of walking trails, beautiful lawns, ponds, fountains, and basketball & tennis courts.

neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood is safe and trendy. It’s a great neighborhood for New York City commuters and travelers as well as for those that want to enjoy a bit more calmness than Manhattan while being minutes away from it.

Aside from the proximity to the underground transportation with Manhattan and other parts of New Jersey, you will have in less than 5 minutes walk a large diversity of exciting cafes, restaurants, bars, shops, yoga studios, gyms and a great supermarket (Keyfood).

In less than 15 minutes walk you will reach a large shopping mall, a multiplex movie theater, several parks, and the riverside with some of the best views in the New York Metropolitan Area. If you want more shopping, next to the Newport Mall, you can find Shoprite, BJ’S Wholesale, Bed Bath & Beyond, The Home Depot and Target.

name: Gorgeous Designer Home - Parking & Private Yard
description:
Gorgeous, designer home accommodates up to three guests for long-term stays. Here's your private oasis!

Feel right at home with everything you need including outdoor dining space and patio. One private parking place out front as well!

Walk two blocks to Lincoln Park. Quick drive to downtown Jersey City & easy bus to Journal Square to get the PATH into Manhattan.

host_location: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States
host_about:
Hi, I'm Miz!

I have lived in the NYC area for 8 years, and have been sharing my space (now spaces!) with guests since 2014. I love hosting!

I grew up in Houston, Texas, went to college in Pennsylvania, and spent time living in Italy, Spain, and Australia before moving to NYC. I currently live in Jersey City.

I am a real estate agent and property manager, and in my spare time I enjoy long walks in the neighborhood, wandering around NYC, all the self-care (massages, facials, yoga), and eating out (plus a good cocktail) with friends. 

I'm an avid traveler and have stayed with friends all over the world. I love to get a local experience when I travel, so I'm happy to provide that for my guests. My partner Mario and I host together, so you may hear or see him as well! 

Any and all questions welcome! I want to make sure you have a great time in Jersey City & NYC.

name: ADORABLE SUNNY BEDROOM - 10 MIN TO NYC*
description:
No Short-terms stay.
Smart opportunity for guests who want to visit NYC without paying the overwhelming City prices. Great choice for visitors, business travelers or students.
Fascinating location in Jersey City with short walk to train station: 15 minute subway commute into Manhattan, 10min ride to World Trade Center/10min to Newark Int'Airport. Also cheap Uber/Lyft rides.
Driving? Precisely 5-10min drive to NYC via Holland Tunnel (normal traffic)

Free street parking.

The space
Brand new furniture. This bedroom has a queen size bed. It is very spacious, has a desk and chair if you need to work or organize your stuff. Large clothes closet with drawers.
It's right off the living room and has 3 sunny windows and shared full bathroom.

Bedroom has its own closet with safety lock and a lot of space to store luggage and organize your personal belongings.

Strategic location and easy commute to New York City and Do
neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood is very quiet and safe. A melting pot of different ethnicities and cultural backgrounds. Beautifully diverse but mainly professionals and full-time workers living in a family community. The courthouse building is across the street with full security 24/7
Security cameras on premises 24/7. Never had any issue or safety situation in the past 10 years that I've lived here. I really love and appreciate our growing community.
host_location: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States
host_about:
Hi I am Zack 34 year old man. I am self-employed, working in building my own business  as I do part time in hospitality in NYC and Newark airport. I enjoy painting and gardening.
I  make sure the house is clean and always looks presentable. I have great neighborhood and my house is super comfy and quiet. I would love to host you and make sure you have an enjoyable comfortable and most importantly clean stay. Ask me any question you may have in mind. I love helping by providing the best recommendations around the city, best restaurants and things to do in the area.
I am pretty laid back, I enjoy running (and cooking), gardening, socializing, traveling. I also like to keep a very clean house and respect the environment.

 Looking forward welcoming you :)

neighborhood_overview: Jersey City is the second most populous city in the state of New Jersey. Located just across the Hudson River from Lower Manhattan, it’s part of the New York metropolitan area. The city’s architecture ranges from Industrial Age homes to classic brownstones to modern high rises. Downtown Jersey City, a major historical district, overlooks the Manhattan skyline. The waterfront section of the city is nicknamed “Wall Street West” for being home to several employers in the financial services, securities and insurance industries. The lofty office buildings, including the highly distinctive Goldman Sachs Tower, create a stunning skyline. With its proximity to Manhattan, Jersey City is popular among young professionals working in New York City looking for an alternative to living in one of the five boroughs. neighborhood_overview: Jersey City is the second most populous city in the state of New Jersey. Located just across the Hudson River from Lower Manhattan, it’s part of the New York metropolitan area. The city’s architecture ranges from Industrial Age homes to classic brownstones to modern high rises. Downtown Jersey City, a major historical district, overlooks the Manhattan skyline. The waterfront section of the city is nicknamed “Wall Street West” for being home to several employers in the financial services, securities and insurance industries. The lofty office buildings, including the highly distinctive Goldman Sachs Tower, create a stunning skyline. With its proximity to Manhattan, Jersey City is popular among young professionals working in New York City looking for an alternative to living in one of the five boroughs. neighborhood_overview: Jersey City is the second most populous city in the state of New Jersey. Located just across the Hudson River from Lower Manhattan, it’s part of the New York metropolitan area. The city’s architecture ranges from Industrial Age homes to classic brownstones to modern high rises. Downtown Jersey City, a major historical district, overlooks the Manhattan skyline. The waterfront section of the city is nicknamed “Wall Street West” for being home to several employers in the financial services, securities and insurance industries. The lofty office buildings, including the highly distinctive Goldman Sachs Tower, create a stunning skyline. With its proximity to Manhattan, Jersey City is popular among young professionals working in New York City looking for an alternative to living in one of the five boroughs. neighborhood_overview: Jersey City Heights offers easy access to Manhattan, and also lots of fun and quirky neighborhood bars and restaurants. Washington park (just a block away) has tennis, basketball, playgrounds and beautiful gardens. You'll find everything you need on Central Avenue (just a 5 minute walk) including groceries, drugstores, and eclectic shops. Jersey City is known for its chill and diverse urban landscape, with beautiful street art and amazing ethnic cuisine. We're only a five minute drive from downtown galleries and boutiques. Or take the 9th Street Elevator to explore Hoboken's unique restaurants and shops.

neighborhood_overview: Jersey City is the second most populous city in the state of New Jersey. Located just across the Hudson River from Lower Manhattan, it’s part of the New York metropolitan area. The city’s architecture ranges from Industrial Age homes to classic brownstones to modern high rises. Downtown Jersey City, a major historical district, overlooks the Manhattan skyline. The waterfront section of the city is nicknamed “Wall Street West” for being home to several employers in the financial services, securities and insurance industries. The lofty office buildings, including the highly distinctive Goldman Sachs Tower, create a stunning skyline. With its proximity to Manhattan, Jersey City is popular among young professionals working in New York City looking for an alternative to living in one of the five boroughs. It is also one of the most ethnically diverse cities in the world, with large populations of Hispanic, Asian and Indian Americans. The Port Authority Trans-Hudson (PATH) train, a 24-hour s

neighborhood_overview: Known affectionately as the "sixth borough," Jersey City is staking its claim as a destination in its own right within the New York City metropolitan area. Young professionals, artists and families have flocked to the Jersey side of the Hudson in recent years and have created a city that is both an extension of Manhattan and a place where you can see and feel an authentic Jersey vibe. Visitors to New York City will find that Jersey City not only offers more reasonably-priced accommodations with easy access to the Big Apple, but also noteworthy parks, restaurants, bars and other attractions that will make for a fun and memorable trip.

host_about:
I am young, 'trendy' (try to be) professional living in New York.  I moved to NY one year ago from London, although I'm originally from Australia. 

My style of Airbnb-hosting is to provide an extremely high standard - the best service and 'space' that I can, so that my guests enjoy themselves to the fullest.  Over the last few years I have had the pleasure of staying in many Airbnb places all around the world; and I have had wonderful experiences.  Now I want to return the favor, I want you to feel like you are in a 5 Star Hotel.   

Briefly about my career... Two years ago I moved out of the 'Start-up field' to start my own business in Real Estate, and haven't looked back since.  

My motto in life is cliche but true: You can get anything you want in your life as long as you put your heart and mind into it, whilst at the same time having a strong sense of integrity.

neighborhood_overview: Jersey City is the second most populous city in the state of New Jersey. Located just across the Hudson River from Lower Manhattan, it’s part of the New York metropolitan area. The city’s architecture ranges from Industrial Age homes to classic brownstones to modern high rises. Downtown Jersey City, a major historical district, overlooks the Manhattan skyline. The waterfront section of the city is nicknamed “Wall Street West” for being home to several employers in the financial services, securities and insurance industries. The lofty office buildings, including the highly distinctive Goldman Sachs Tower, create a stunning skyline. With its proximity to Manhattan, Jersey City is popular among young professionals working in New York City looking for an alternative to living in one of the five boroughs. name: Unique Large-2BR *Heart of Downtown JC*5min-to-NYC
description:
Located on a quiet, tree lined street with less than 1 minutes walk from the vibrant Grove Street PATH Station, which is open 24 hours and only 5 minutes ride to lower Manhattan and 10 minutes to mid-town Manhattan.

We will provide you with an experience of a home away from home. You will find many of the daily necessities and comfort here, and more to ensure that you enjoy your stay to the utmost.

The space
The entire building was gut renovated in 2015 and this 3rd floor apartment unit is newly furnished for the first time. It has a front main unit with 1 bedroom, full bathroom, living room and a fully equipped kitchen. Across the common hallway to the rear, you will find the sanctuary of a large private 2nd bedroom. Each bedroom is provided with an elegant working desk. All designed with your comfort and functionality in mind.

It also includes high speed internet and cable TV.

Please see photo of floor-layout for more detail

name: Spacious & Comfortable Room For Long-term Stay**
description:
Spacious, light-filled room with a big closet for one person. Big bedroom in a shared apartment with 4 other young, clean, professionals. In the fantastic neighborhood of Jersey City Heights. The bus is one and half a block away. Also cheap Uber ride to Hoboken, with direct PATH train to the city. Bathrooms are clean, and WIFI is available throughout. The apartment is equipped with a central heating/cooling system and washer/dryer in the unit.

The space
The apartment is huge and has 5 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The room has a big closet, a nice desk for working, a comfortable full-size bed, a nightstand, and a lamp.

Move in and you're at home. It's that easy! Laundry machine and dishwasher available for your use.

Guest access
You will have sole access to your bedroom. The rest of the apartment is shared.

Other things to note
Cleaners stop by twice a month to clean the common areas of the apartment.
neighborhood_overview: Just across the river from Manhattan, Jersey City is considered the sixth borough of New York City. There are frequent buses to Times Square just a 5 min short walk away from the apartment. Buses run every 10 minutes. There are plenty of local restaurants nearby with diverse and delicious cuisine.

name: Lovely Downtown JC Apartment Steps to PATH Train!
description:
Amazing 3 bedroom apartment in a historic brownstone steps from the Grove Street PATH train. Two stops into Manhattan! Enjoy your stay in the hottest area in Downtown Jersey City! Everything you need right out your door! This apartment is available for up to a group of five for monthly stays.

The space
Amazing apartment with old world charm, steps to restaurants, stores, outdoor markets, and public transit. Three bedrooms and one bathroom, with a large kitchen area stocked with everything you need to feel at home.
neighborhood_overview: Jersey City is an exciting and charming neighborhood full of tons of activities for everyone. Great restaurants and cafes are just outside the door of the apartment. Regular events take place outside on Newark Ave. Enjoy all Jersey City has to offer!
host_location: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States
host_about:
Hi, I'm Miz!

I have lived in the NYC area for 8 years, and have been sharing my space (now spaces!) with guests since 2014. I love hosting!

I grew up in Houston, Texas, went to college in Pennsylvania, and spent time living in Italy, Spain, and Australia before moving to NYC. I currently live in Jersey City.

I am a real estate agent and property manager, and in my spare time I enjoy long walks in the neighborhood, wandering around NYC, all the self-care (massages, facials, yoga), and eating out (plus a good cocktail) with friends. 

I'm an avid traveler and have stayed with friends all over the world. I love to get a local experience when I travel, so I'm happy to provide that for my guests. My partner Mario and I host together, so you may hear or see him as well! 

Any and all questions welcome! I want to make sure you have a great time in Jersey City & NYC.

We take the health and safety of guests seriously. Between each stay, the apartment is thoroughly cleaned and sanitized following guidance from the CDC. Cleaners wear protective garments (e.g., mask, gloves) and wipe surfaces, cabinet handles, door knobs, etc. with cleaning solutions that follow CDC guidance. neighborhood_overview: McGinley Square is an area of Jersey City that is quickly gaining popularity as a hotspot and is also considered the heart of Jersey City. Located near the middle of the city, south of Journal Square, the “square” itself is at the intersection of two of the city’s major thoroughfares, Montgomery Street and Bergen Avenue. This neighborhood is quickly burgeoning with lots of shops, restaurants, bars — and new places to explore. The McGinley Square Special Improvement District has also helped in boosting this neighborhood, creating a weekly pop-up Pedestrian Plaza on weekends.

description:
Our guest studio apartment in Jersey City is 3 min walk to Path Journal Square train station! This garden level apartment has a private entrance from the street. Amenities include washer dryer, kitchenette, central heat and air. The neighborhood is diverse with variety of eateries. Taxi, Uber, city bikes and bus terminal are walking distances. New York City is 15 min train ride by PATH train. Local spots include Liberty Science Center, Ellis Island ( Statue of Liberty), down town marina.

The space
The apartment has a desk and chair for working from home. A full size bed and a sofa bed for extra sleeping arrangement. Some traffic noise may be experienced as it is close to the main road. However we will provide earplugs for your convenience. Enjoy free strong WiFi, central air and heating. Common washer and dryer are located adjacent to the back exit door.

neighborhood_overview:
Apartment is located at Newport of Jersey City which is master-planned, mixed-use community in Downtown Jersey City, New Jersey,

Newport consists of retail, residential, office, and entertainment facilities. The neighborhood is situated on the Hudson Waterfront and located opposite Lower Manhattan and the neighborhood of Tribeca in New York City.

The apartment is just behind the Newport Centre Mall, a large traditional indoor shopping complex anchored by Macy's, JCPenney, Sears, Kohl's, H&M, and ZARA.

Outside the mall and around the Newport area are a variety of primarily neighborhood oriented restaurants and retail stores (known collectively as "The Newport River Market") including a number of notables such as a Target Staples and Best Buy

It also houses many world class restaurants

You can't see the view of the NYC skyline from the city itself. The best spot is from Jersey City. Our residential neighborhood is an urban-suburban mixed feel with easily accessible public transportation. The neighbors around are friendly. It is also safe and quiet at night.

Similarly Downtown Jersey City has delicious cuisines, bars, a thriving nightlife and amazing views of the Manhattan skyline.

BUILT in 2001, a “brownstone” on the tax records but with modern luxuries: central air, steel tiled breakfast bars, PRIVATE FULL SIZE wshr/dry, mocha hardwoods, JACUZZI JET TUB, sun drenched back porch and yard. AMAZING DRIVEWAY PARKING available by request.

“Hilltop” neighborhood-best in Jersey City!
Drive to Soho/Tribeca in 10 min/under 3 miles! NYC Dreamin’!!

The space
Why go for a crowded elevator complex with increased COVID risks, long elevator wait times, and long walks to your parking spot? And definitely don’t go for a place built 140yrs ago with guaranteed maintenance issues!

“NYC Dreamin” features a TREMENDOUS KITCHEN with everything you need including Kurig, french press, teapot, microwave, toaster, blender and even a juicer and a rice maker!

Sleeper sofa in l
neighborhood_overview:
A gem of a lot: Northern side of the building creates the backdrop for the charming courtyards for a row of Magnolia brownstones: picturesque views from kitchens, bedrooms, and several levels of back porches.

Only 350 yards to JSQ PATH train - ONLY 3 STOPS to either WTC or Christopher St!! Even if you aren’t a ‘train person’, this tremendous commute makes it doable.

Location, Location, Location: A perfect balance: in the sought after Hilltop section of Jersey City yet with walking distance to the ‘Village’ area restaurants and nightlife.

“NYC Dreamin” sits in a fantastic neighborhood called the ‘Hilltop’, which is a highly sought after neighborhood in JC! There are some really prominent immediate neighbors here: we share a property line with high ranking politician’s family as well as a lawyer whose family has been there for 97years. Google “Hilltop Jersey City” and you will see that there is a ton of history here as well as positive commentaries

A gem of a lot: Northern side of the building is a row of charming courtyards of Magnolia street historic brownstones.

Only 350 yards to JSQ PATH train - ONLY 3 STOPS to either WTC or Christopher St!! Even if you aren’t a ‘train person’, this tremendous commute makes it doable.

Location, Location, Location: A perfect balance: in the sought after Hilltop section of Jersey City yet with walking distance to the ‘Village’ area restaurants and nightlife.

“242 Contemporary” sits in a fantastic neighborhood called the ‘Hilltop’, which is a highly sought after neighborhood in JC! There are some really prominent immediate neighbors here: we share a property line with high ranking politician’s family as well as a lawyer whose family has been there for 97years. Google “Hilltop Jersey City” and you will see that there is a ton of history here as well as positive commentaries.

The space
The pictures speak for themselves, but as you walk in to your left you will find a fully stocked kitchen with SMEG kitchen appliances onon the countertop in the corner, including a coffee maker, tea kettle, toaster, blender, and more. In the living room adjacent to the kitchen you will find one sofa and one beautiful cloud couch that has luxury comfort written all over it. The couch alone retails for over $10,000, to put it into perspective. The rug located in the living room is made from imported cow fur, and the candles scattered throughout the
neighborhood_overview: Amazing area of Jersey City. Every Saturday of the year through October there is an event directly outside the complex run by Mack-Cali called the Smorgasburg. The Smorgasburg runs until 6PM and includes dozens of vendors that represent the best restaurant's in the region. From Rice-Cake Chicken Burgers, To Bang Cookies, And Back To The Best Dumplings/Rice Balls you'll ever have the Smorgasburg has it all. With that being said, this is just one example of many events that occur in the neighborhood on Bay Street. There is also drive-in movie nights, life size chess, little and big dog parks, a luxury mall right around the corner, and much more. The list goes on.

neighborhood_overview:
You can't see the view of the NYC skyline from the city itself. The best spot is from Jersey City. We are only 7mins drive away from the ‎Liberty State Park which is voted #1 best Manhattan view in Jersey City! Enjoy a relaxing dinner at the Liberty House Restuarant with iconic views of the NYC skyline, Ellis Island, and Lady Liberty.

Within 5 mins by drive, there are also a local brewery and a cocktail bar/distillery open until midnight.

Our residential neighborhood is an urban-suburban mixed feel with easily accessible public transportation. The neighbors around are friendly. It is also safe and quiet at night.

We have one security camera on the front porch and one facing the garage. They will be on during your stay. Parking peace of mind all time!

I’ve also been in NYC for over 20 years and I’d be happy to help you find things to do, best place to eat, where to shop, ways to save money and clubs to dance the night away. 

Feel free to book my listing and I hope you have a nice stay.

description:
BE THE FIRST to enjoy this newly constructed 3 bedroom condo located in Jersey City, commonly know as New York City's 6th borough!

host_location: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States
host_about:
Hello, and welcome to our home. My husband and I would be so happy to host you in our newly constructed Jersey City condo. We both share a huge passion for travel, and we have been blessed to live and visit many places all over the world. Chris and I decided to root ourselves in the city that has so much to offer which is Jersey City. While settling here, we decided to give our fellow travel lovers a place that feels like home. With southern hospitality in our roots, we have a deep love for hosting, and we look forward to extending that love and warmth to our new friends.
Our modern, sun-drenched condo offers a tranquil vibe, which is perfect to come home to after a long day of exploring the city. This location is perfect for families who want to visit Jersey City  or New York area. The location is prime for any sports enthusiasts as we are a quick fifteen-minute drive to MetLife stadium—home of the New York Giants and New York Jets. The area is also suited for travel healthcare professionals, as we are near many hospitals including Jersey City hospital. Newark international airport is a quick twelve-minute drive and in thirty minutes you are in the BIG APPLE! New York City.

Mon rêve : faire le tour du monde.. J'adore voyager, découvrir de nouvelles cultures et surtout partager.

En tant que hôte je pense être assez arrangeante, pas prise de tête et surtout disponible pour donner des conseils ou juste bavarder :-)

En tant que voyageuse.. j'ai déjà eu à faire du couchsurfing et mes hôtes étaient très contents.. je pense en tout cas vu qu'on est toujours en contact ;-)

name: Cozy 1 bedroom unit in Jersey City!
description:
1 bed/1 bath private unit with private entrance and deck in a two family home in the Bergen Lafayette section of Jersey City. Good for 1-2 adults only.

The unit is a third floor walk-up. Minutes to parks including: Liberty State Park and several modes of transportation: Garfield Avenue Lightrail stop, buses to the PATH, as well as CitiBike docking stations. Short Uber ride to DT JC. Quick and easy car access to 440, 78, 1/9, and NJTP. Street parking available for one vehicle.

The space
The apartment is a perfect remote work space as well, with a desk, high-speed wifi and a smart TV.

Guest access
Parking is free street parking with street cleaning days/times to be observed to avoid getting a parking ticket. One car is permitted.

Minutes away from the nearest bus and LightRail stops and a 10 minute Uber ride to the Grove Street, Journal Square or Exchange Place PATH stops into NYC.

Welcome to Jersey City!

Hi! We're Deb and Mark and are so glad you'll be staying with us. We own and live on property with our three loyal and chipper dogs. description:

The apartment has beautiful finishes and comes fully outfitted with kitchen, bedroom, & bathroom essentials. Please note, the furnishings & room details WILL VARY as the unit is set up for you upon booking. We are an experienced professional hospitality company that works directly with the property to transform vacant units into your home away from home.

The space
We take the health and safety of guests seriously. Between each stay, the apartment is thoroughly cleaned and sanitized following guidance from the CDC. name: Cozy NYC Themed Private Studio in Jersey City
description:
A stones throw to NYC! Retreat to this urban-chic studio after a day of exploring. Private entrance sleeping 2-4 visitors. Close to Liberty State Park, wedged between 2 light rail stations. Holland tunnel is an 8 minute drive.

The space
Huge private living space with a cool NYC theme. Perfect for business travelers and couples. Equipped with fridge, microwave and coffee maker. There is also a flat screen TV with free Netflix and a super convenient bodega just a few steps away.

Guest access
The entire unit is for you! It's a spacious studio with a bathroom, living space and a cute little breakfast area.

Other things to note
Street parking is available but there are no permits so you should be good there. You will find more parking closer to Berry Lane park right behind the home. The grind coffee shop is close and delicious along with great food in the area like Harry's Daughter and Martha's for breakfast!
neighborhood_overview: Cute residential home in the heart of Bergen Lafayette. Close to berry lane park, liberty state park, 2 light rails for easy transportation, the turnpike is 2 minutes away. The science center is in walking distance. NYC is a quick path ride away!

name: Jersey City Suites: short walk to Light Rail & NJT
description: Welcome to your home away from home! Our property is located in Jersey City within two minutes of the Light Rail, which can connect you to The Liberty Science Center, Liberty State Park, Hoboken, and Manhattan. The guests' spaces include two private bedrooms with natural light and Roku Tv, as well as, a full private bathroom. Shared spaces include a complete eat-in kitchen, 1/2 bathroom, and a comfortable living room area. Additionally, wifi access will be made available. Hope to see you soon!
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
Hi!
We are Hassan and Patti, the self-proclaimed "HoneyPots". Join us as we embark on this new Airbnb hosting journey together. Here's just a little bit about us: 

Hassan is a Brooklyn Native (you won't meet many these days) who knows the ins and outs of this exciting and ever-changing NYC. Patti is what she likes to call a born-again New Yorker; after spending 10 years in Miami, she has returned to her home city and has never looked back. Hassan, a model and high-end security detail, met Patti, an artist and kitchen designer,  in the Spring of 2016. Patti has been hosting on Airbnb for over 5 years and they have been hosting together for over a year now.  

We are very excited to be hosting together in our hand-me-down apartment (it's a lot nicer than that sounds) and hope you all enjoy!

Safe Travels,

The Honey Pots

name: Jersey City Traveler: seconds from public transit
description: Welcome to your home away from home! host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
Hi!
We are Hassan and Patti, the self-proclaimed "HoneyPots". Join us as we embark on this new Airbnb hosting journey together. Here's just a little bit about us: 

Hassan is a Brooklyn Native (you won't meet many these days) who knows the ins and outs of this exciting and ever-changing NYC. Patti is what she likes to call a born-again New Yorker; after spending 10 years in Miami, she has returned to her home city and has never looked back. Hassan, a model and high-end security detail, met Patti, an artist and kitchen designer,  in the Spring of 2016. Patti has been hosting on Airbnb for over 5 years and they have been hosting together for over a year now.  

We are very excited to be hosting together in our hand-me-down apartment (it's a lot nicer than that sounds) and hope you all enjoy!

Safe Travels,

The Honey Pots

description:
Located by the Hackensack River Waterfront is this chic, luxury apt within walking distance to West Side Ave and the Hudson Mall for top shopping, dining and entertainment.
The apt features all the luxuries of a 5 star hotel with a gorgeous living space, a gourmet kitchen loaded with snacks and refreshments, a lavish bedroom and a sparkling bathroom with soft bathrobes and quality amenities.

neighborhood_overview:
Located on the west side of Jersey City, the Hackensack River Waterfront offers guests a true Jersey neighborhood vibe with plenty of beautiful outdoor spaces, shopping and dining to explore.
The Waterfront also provides excellent shopping and dining options at Hudson Mall (15 min walk), along with easy access to a vibrant stretch of diverse eateries, boutiques, supermakets and bars on West Side Avenue (13 min walk).
The picturesque Lincoln Park is just minutes away and offers walking and biking trails, picnic spots, wildlife, artistic statues and even a casino all close to home. Liberty State Park is also just a short drive away.
The apartments close proximity to New Jersey City University and Saint Peter’s University makes it the perfect base for students or visiting family and friends. Start your mornings just how you like them at Blends café a 3 minute walk up the road, then after a day exploring the city, finish it off with some delicious Gelato from Jersey & Co an

name: beautiful apartment  20 mins from Manhattan!
description:
2-Bedroom rental with outdoor terrace within walking distance from Journal Square Path station and just 20 mins from Manhattan!

Enjoy New York and then retreat to a peaceful space to recharge for the next day!

The space
Enjoy this beautiful and cozy two bedroom apartment in a quiet area in Jersey City. The two bedrooms, both have comfortable queen beds. The living room has a beautiful couch with a 55" TV with Netflix and Hulu. This apartment has everything you need to make you feel at home, including a Keurig for you to enjoy a nice cup of coffee while looking out the terrace.

Guest access
Rental has keypad lock for contact free access and easy breezy check in and check out.

name: NYC-bound 2 br apartment with outdoor Urban Oasis
description:
Enjoy a central Jersey City location about 20-30 minutes away from NYC (mid-town Manhattan). A luxurious, modern space with an outdoor Urban Oasis - complete with a raised back deck, outdoor seating for four, lower floating deck, and a covered gazebo.

This 2 bed, 1.5 bath renovated apartment with free off-street parking is right across the street from a beautiful park, and in walking distance of multiple buses and trains to get directly into NYC.

The space
Modern space with all natural hardwood floors, plush area rugs, and city-inspired decor. TVs in living room and both bedrooms all have access to Netflix, HBO Max, Disney Plus, Prime Video, and more.

Guest access
Free driveway parking for one car is included. Located across the street from a park, so street parking is readily available.
neighborhood_overview:
Local Central Ave (located 5-10 mins away walking) is filled with over 50 restaurants, bars, retail shops, pharmacies, retail shops, and more.

See below for 2021 Central Ave BEST businesses, nominated by locals.

Central Avenue Businesses nominated:
Best Pizza: Renato's Pizza Masters (278 Central)
Best Margarita: Los Tres Chillitos (456 Central)
Best EyeBrow Spot: Mystique Full Service Salon both their JC (251 Central) & Hoboken location
Best Delivery Restaurant: Saigon Bistro (514 Central)
Best Cookie: Cocoa Bakery (475 Central)

Best Bagel: Wonder Bagel (329 Central)
Best Avacado Toast: Griot Cafe (398 Central)
Best Mutz: Andrea Salumeria (247 Central)
Best Dessert Shop: The Law of Donutgineering (7 Bleecker)
host_location: Jersey City, New Jersey, United States
host_about:
I'm an easy-going guy who loves to travel and enjoy the world around him. I often travel for work, thus leaving my apartment available to guests visiting the area (JC, NYC, Newark, etc). I joined AirBnB as it seemed to be a perfect fit for my lifestyle and the flexibility in which it offers as both a guest and a host.

For fun, I enjoy pretty much any of the performing arts, particularly theater, music, and improv comedy. I love movies - way too many to starting naming specific titles but I will say the Lord of the Rings and Harry Potter series (books & movies) changed my life. 

I'm a big believer in kindness and consideration. The golden rule: "treat others the way you wish to be treated." I feel the same way about my belongings and those of others. : )

name: Cozy apartment for you | 1BR in Jersey City
description:
Stay for 30+ nights (minimum nights and rates are FIRM) where you’ll have the entire apartment all to yourself at 3 Journal Square. The apartment has beautiful finishes and comes fully outfitted with kitchen, bedroom, & bathroom essentials. Please note, the furnishings & room details WILL VARY as the unit is set up for you upon booking. We are an experienced professional hospitality company that works directly with the property to transform vacant units into your home away from home.

The space
We take the health and safety of guests seriously. Between each stay, the apartment is thoroughly cleaned and sanitized following guidance from the CDC. Cleaners wear protective garments (e.g., mask, gloves) and wipe surfaces, cabinet handles, door knobs, etc. with cleaning solutions that follow CDC guidance. All linens, dishware, glassware and silverware are also washed between stays. Cleaning products and tools are provided so you can clean and sanitize as well.
